configUNIQUE_INTERRUPT_PRIORITIES.Name: configUNIQUE_INTERRUPT_PRIORITIES
configUNIQUE_INTERRUPT_PRIORITIES.Description: Set the number of interrupt priority

configUSE_PREEMPTION.Name: configUSE_PREEMPTION
configUSE_PREEMPTION.Description: 0 for Preemptive scheduler;1 for Collaborative scheduler

configUSE_TICKLESS_IDLE.Name: configUSE_TICKLESS_IDLE
configUSE_TICKLESS_IDLE.Description: 0 for keeping tick interrupt;1 for no tick mode

configMAX_PRIORITIES.Name: configMAX_PRIORITIES
configMAX_PRIORITIES.Description: Number of priority levels available for application tasks

configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE.Name: configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE
configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE.Description: Stack size used by idle tasks

configMAX_TASK_NAME_LEN.Name: configMAX_TASK_NAME_LEN
configMAX_TASK_NAME_LEN.Description: Max allowed length of task name

configUSE_16_BIT_TICKS.Name: configUSE_16_BIT_TICKS
configUSE_16_BIT_TICKS.Description: The number of times a tick has been executed

configIDLE_SHOULD_YIELD.Name: configIDLE_SHOULD_YIELD
configIDLE_SHOULD_YIELD.Description: Control the behavior of idle priority tasks

configUSE_TASK_NOTIFICATIONS.Name: configUSE_TASK_NOTIFICATIONS
configUSE_TASK_NOTIFICATIONS.Description: 1 for Direct task notification function;0 for no Direct task notification function

configUSE_RECURSIVE_MUTEXES.Name: configUSE_RECURSIVE_MUTEXES
configUSE_RECURSIVE_MUTEXES.Description: 1 for recursive mutexes; 0 for no recursive mutexes

configUSE_COUNTING_SEMAPHORES.Name: configUSE_COUNTING_SEMAPHORES
configUSE_COUNTING_SEMAPHORES.Description: 1 for Counting semaphore function ;0 for no Counting semaphore function

configQUEUE_REGISTRY_SIZE.Name: configQUEUE_REGISTRY_SIZE
configQUEUE_REGISTRY_SIZE.Description: The max number of registered queues and semaphores

configUSE_QUEUE_SETS.Name: configUSE_QUEUE_SETS
configUSE_QUEUE_SETS.Description: 1 for queue collection function; 0 for Ignore queue collection function

configUSE_TIME_SLICING.Name: configUSE_TIME_SLICING
configUSE_TIME_SLICING.Description: 1 for Preemptive priority scheduling for time slices, 0 for Preemptive priority scheduling

configUSE_NEWLIB_REENTRANT.Name: configUSE_NEWLIB_REENTRANT
configUSE_NEWLIB_REENTRANT.Description: 1 for Newlib reentry structure;0 for no Newlib reentry structure

configENABLE_BACKWARD_COMPATIBILITY.Name: configENABLE_BACKWARD_COMPATIBILITY
configENABLE_BACKWARD_COMPATIBILITY.Description: 0 for disable backword compatibility;1 for enable backword compatibility

configNUM_THREAD_LOCAL_STORAGE_POINTERS.Name: configNUM_THREAD_LOCAL_STORAGE_POINTERS
configNUM_THREAD_LOCAL_STORAGE_POINTERS.Description: Set the thread local storage array grab value for each task

configSUPPORT_STATIC_ALLOCATION.Name: configSUPPORT_STATIC_ALLOCATION
configSUPPORT_STATIC_ALLOCATION.Description: 1 for support static allocation; 0 for not support static alloction

configSUPPORT_DYNAMIC_ALLOCATION.Name: configSUPPORT_DYNAMIC_ALLOCATION
configSUPPORT_DYNAMIC_ALLOCATION.Description: 1 for support dynamic allocation; 0 for not support dynamic alloction

configAPPLICATION_ALLOCATED_HEAP.Name: configAPPLICATION_ALLOCATED_HEAP
configAPPLICATION_ALLOCATED_HEAP.Description: 1 for support declare heap 0 for not support declare heap

configUSE_IDLE_HOOK.Name: configUSE_IDLE_HOOK
configUSE_IDLE_HOOK.Description: 1 for support idle hook; 0 for not support idle hook

configUSE_TICK_HOOK.Name: configUSE_TICK_HOOK
configUSE_TICK_HOOK.Description: 1 for support tick hook; 0 for not support tick hook

configCHECK_FOR_STACK_OVERFLOW.Name: configCHECK_FOR_STACK_OVERFLOW
configCHECK_FOR_STACK_OVERFLOW.Description: 1 for support Stack overflow detection,0 for not support Stack overflow detection

configUSE_MALLOC_FAILED_HOOK.Name: configUSE_MALLOC_FAILED_HOOK
configUSE_MALLOC_FAILED_HOOK.Description: 1 for support malloc failure 0 for not support malloc failure

Run time and task stats gathering relate.Name: Run time and task stats gathering related definitions
Run time and task stats gathering relate.Description: Run time and task stats gathering related definitions config

configGENERATE_RUN_TIME_STATS.Name: configGENERATE_RUN_TIME_STATS
configGENERATE_RUN_TIME_STATS.Description: 1 for support run time stats 0 for not support run time stats

configUSE_TRACE_FACILITY.Name: configUSE_TRACE_FACILITY
configUSE_TRACE_FACILITY.Description: 1 for support trace facility 0 for not support trace facility

configUSE_CO_ROUTINES.Name: configUSE_CO_ROUTINES
configUSE_CO_ROUTINES.Description: 1 for support co_routines function 0 for not support co_routines

configMAX_CO_ROUTINE_PRIORITIES.Name: configMAX_CO_ROUTINE_PRIORITIES
configMAX_CO_ROUTINE_PRIORITIES.Description: Number of priority levels available for application collaboration

configUSE_TIMERS.Name: configUSE_TIMERS
configUSE_TIMERS.Description: 1 for support timers 0 for not support timers

configTIMER_TASK_PRIORITY.Name: configTIMER_TASK_PRIORITY
configTIMER_TASK_PRIORITY.Description: Setting the Priority of Software Timer Service/Guardian Tasks

configTIMER_QUEUE_LENGTH.Name: configTIMER_QUEUE_LENGTH
configTIMER_QUEUE_LENGTH.Description: Set the length of the software timer command queue

Optional functions.Name: Software timer related definitions
Optional functions.Description: most linkers will remove unused functions anyway

INCLUDE_vTaskPrioritySet.Name: INCLUDE_vTaskPrioritySet
INCLUDE_vTaskPrioritySet.Description: Enable the function vTaskPrioritySet to set task priority or not

INCLUDE_uxTaskPriorityGet.Name: INCLUDE_uxTaskPriorityGet
INCLUDE_uxTaskPriorityGet.Description: Enable the function vTaskPrioritySet for obtaining task priority or not

INCLUDE_vTaskDelete.Name: INCLUDE_vTaskDelete
INCLUDE_vTaskDelete.Description: Enable the delete function vTaskDelete for the created task example

INCLUDE_vTaskSuspend.Name: INCLUDE_vTaskSuspend
INCLUDE_vTaskSuspend.Description: Enable the function vtaskSuspend to suspend tasks or not

INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil.Name: INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil
INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil.Description: Enable The function vTaskDelayUntil for absolute time delay or not

INCLUDE_vTaskDelay.Name: INCLUDE_vTaskDelay
INCLUDE_vTaskDelay.Description: Enable The function vTaskDelay for relative time delay or not

INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState
INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState.Description: Enable the function obtaining the current state of the scheduler or not

INCLUDE_xTaskGetCurrentTaskHandle.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskGetCurrentTaskHandle
INCLUDE_xTaskGetCurrentTaskHandle.Description: Enable the Function obtaining the current task handle or not

INCLUDE_uxTaskGetStackHighWaterMark.Name: INCLUDE_uxTaskGetStackHighWaterMark
INCLUDE_uxTaskGetStackHighWaterMark.Description: Enable the Function querying the minimum remaining value in task stack history or not

INCLUDE_xTaskGetIdleTaskHandle.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskGetIdleTaskHandle
INCLUDE_xTaskGetIdleTaskHandle.Description: Enable the Function obtaining idle task handles or not

INCLUDE_eTaskGetState.Name: INCLUDE_eTaskGetState
INCLUDE_eTaskGetState.Description: Enable the Functions querying the running status of tasks or not

INCLUDE_xTimerPendFunctionCall.Name: INCLUDE_xTimerPendFunctionCall
INCLUDE_xTimerPendFunctionCall.Description: Enable Timer Service Callback Function or not

INCLUDE_xTaskAbortDelay.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskAbortDelay
INCLUDE_xTaskAbortDelay.Description: Enable the Function task delay blocking to be aborted or not

INCLUDE_xTaskGetHandle.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskGetHandle
INCLUDE_xTaskGetHandle.Description: Enable the Function obtaining task handles or not

INCLUDE_xTaskResumeFromISR.Name: INCLUDE_xTaskResumeFromISR
INCLUDE_xTaskResumeFromISR.Description: Enable the Functions for task execution during interrupts or not
